verbs.description: Within the next three weeks , the Trump administration [V: will] likely decide against re - certifying the Iran nuclear deal , which could lead to a return of sanctions . The loss of Iranian oil could occur against a much tighter oil market than previously expected .

The loss of Iranian oil could occur against a much tighter oil market than previously expected .
